extendedInfo.description: Welcome to your virtual library! The Marion & Ed Hughes Public Library now offers a mobile app for smartphones and other devices that will provide you access to the library 24/7 wherever you are. From accessing your library account, to downloading eBooks, to viewing specialized resources, our mobile app provides access to resources that educate, inform and inspire. You can search for a title, place a request/hold, renew an item or check your account status on loans, requests/holds and fines. Check out the Calendar of Events or connect to our Facebook page to find out what's happening at the library. Spot a great book in a bookstore and wonder if the library has a copy? Just scan the ISBN number and the app searches our catalog for you. And the best part... you can download and use the app for free! So, go ahead. With just a few clicks, the Hughes Public Library is everywhere you are! Note that some resources may require selection of your location and/or your library card number.
